author: ili101
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Windows.Forms

#$Form = [System.Windows.Forms.Form]::new() # Regular Windows Form works.
$Form = [System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog]::new()

$Form.ShowDialog()
```

# Actual behavior
When running the `ShowDialog()` the File Dialog isn't displayed and the console hangs.
For reference regular Form works.
Tested on 7.0.0-preview.1 (And latest preview.2).
Also verified that the code works on Powershell Framework and that `OpenFileDialog()` works on .Net Core 3.0 Preview 5.
